name: The Price of Bread
description:
This game is focused on selling bread to lucky people. You start selling by the side of the road but that dosen't mean you can't expand. Get more customers, get better bread and more! And once you have gone too far, you shall ascend into Bread Heaven.

This game was made for the Godot Wild Jam #51 with the theme Upgrades and the wildcard Bread.
